name: Rogue Problem
description:
Rogue Problem Overview

The Rogue Problem is a puzzle game based on mechanics of Roguelike.
You control '@', who fighting monsters and escape from the dungeon.
There are various dungeon floors in the game, which challenge player's problem-solving abilities.

How to play [Movement]

Arrow keys : Move. You can also move diagonally.
Space :  Stay still.

[Attacking]

If you move into a creature, you attack it.

[Action]

Enter : Use an item, Throw an item etc.
Tab : Repeat last 'using item' or 'throwing item'.

[Other commands]

ESC : Return to Stage select.
X : Examine target.

Credits

Presented by Espoirman
Background Music from GWriterStudio
Sound Effects from Dustyroom game studio
